title: Software Engineer
description:
Company: GoodSpace AI
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Compensation: ‚Çπ6\\-9 LPA
 



 Experience: 0 ‚Äì 3 years
 



 Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



 GoodSpace AI is redefining how companies hire. Our AI\\-driven recruitment platform helps founders and HR teams find, evaluate, and hire qualified talent within 24 hours ‚Äî eliminating the need for endless screening and manual interviews.
 



 We‚Äôre a fast\\-growing startup backed by strong technology and passionate people who believe in making hiring 10x faster and smarter.
 



  





 Role Overview:
 



 We‚Äôre looking for a Software Engineer to join our core product team and help us build scalable, intelligent systems that power our AI recruitment engine. You‚Äôll work on real problems ‚Äî from automating candidate evaluation to building AI\\-driven matching pipelines ‚Äî while contributing to a modern, high\\-performance product stack.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 \\-Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and microservices for our AI hiring platform.
 



 \\-Work closely with product and AI teams to integrate ML/LLM\\-based features into production.
 



 \\-Write clean, efficient, and testable code following best practices.
 



 \\-Optimize system performance and reliability as our user base grows rapidly.
 



 \\-Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and feature planning.
 



 \\-Collaborate cross\\-functionally with designers, data scientists, and backend engineers.
 



  





 What You‚Äôll Need:
 



 \\-0‚Äì3 years of experience in backend or full\\-stack development.

 \\-Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and CI/CD pipelines.

 \\-Bonus: exposure to AI/ML models, FastAPI, or LangChain.
 



  





 Why Join Us:
 



 \\-Work on cutting\\-edge AI\\-driven hiring technology used by top startups and enterprises.

 If you love building scalable systems, working with AI technologies, and solving real\\-world challenges ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to meet you.

title: Development Engineer
description:
**Forvia, a sustainable mobility technology leader**
 We pioneer technology for mobility experience that matter to people.
   

  

**Your Mission, Roles And Responsibilities**
 Are you an engineer with a passion for product development and project management? Do you want to work in a dynamic and international environment where you can apply your skills and creativity to solve technical challenges? If so, you might be the Development Engineer we are looking for.
   

  

 As a Development Engineer, you will be responsible for defining and developing products and processes that meet the quality, cost and timing targets of our customers and Group standards. You will work closely with other engineering teams, suppliers and customers to ensure the technical convergence and feasibility of the product design and manufacturing. You will also manage the Program File in Product Data Management (PDM) and follow the Faurecia Excellence System (FES) and Program Management System (PMS) guidelines.
   

  

**Your profile and competencies to succeed**
**Minimum Education Level**
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in engineering required, Master's degree preferred


**Professional Experience**
* Experience in Design \\& Development within an industrial environment, ideally in the automotive industry
* Knowledge and experience in Project Management process


**Skills And Competencies**
* Team player with strong communication skills
* International mind set
* English required


**What We Can Do For You**
* At Forvia, you will find an engaging and dynamic environment where you can contribute to the development of sustainable mobility leading technologies.
* We are the seventh\\-largest global automotive supplier, employing more than 157,000 people in more than 40 countries which makes a lot of opportunity for career development.
* We welcome energetic and agile people who can thrive in a fast\\-changing environment. People who share our strong values. Team players with a collaborative mindset and a passion to deliver high standards for our clients. Lifelong learners. High performers. Globally minded people who aspire to work in a transforming industry, where excellence, speed, and quality count.
* We cultivate a learning environment, dedicating tools and resources to ensure we remain at the forefront of mobility. Our people enjoy an average of more than 22 hours of online and in\\-person training within FORVIA University (five campuses around the world)
* We offer a multicultural environment that values diversity and international collaboration. We believe that diversity is a strength. To create an inclusive culture where all forms of diversity create real value for the company, we have adopted gender diversity targets and inclusion action plans.
* Achieving CO2 Net Zero as a pioneer of the automotive industry is a priority: In June 2022, Forvia became the first global automotive group to be certified with the new SBTI Net\\-Zero Standard (the most ambitious standard of SBTi), aligned with the ambition of the 2015 Paris Agreement of limiting global warming to 1\\.5¬∞C. Three principles guide our action:‚ÄØuse less, use better‚ÄØand‚ÄØuse longer, with a focus on recyclability and circular economy.


**Why join us**
 FORVIA is an automotive technology group at the heart of smarter and more sustainable mobility. We bring together expertise in electronics, clean mobility, lighting, interiors, seating, and lifecycle solutions to drive change in the automotive industry.
   

  

 With a history stretching back more than a century, we are the 7th largest global automotive supplier, employing more than 157,000 people in 43 countries. You'll find our technology in around 1 out of 2 vehicles produced anywhere in the world.
   

  

 In June 2022, we became the 1st global automotive group to be certified with the SBTI Net\\-Zero Standard. We have committed to reach CO2 Net Zero by no later than 2045\\.
   

  

 As technological innovation and the need for sustainability transform the automotive industry, we are ideally positioned to deliver solutions that will enhance the lives of road\\-users everywhere.

title: Senior Staff Engineer,
description:
**Company Description**
**üëãüèº** 
**We're Nagarro.**
 We are a Digital Product Engineering company that is scaling in a big way! We build products, services, and experiences that inspire, excite, and delight. We work at scale across all devices and digital mediums, and our people exist everywhere in the world (17500\\+ experts across 39 countries, to be exact). Our work culture is dynamic and non\\-hierarchical. We're looking for great new colleagues. That's where you come in!
   

  

**Job Description**
**REQUIREMENTS:**
* Total experience 10\\+ years
* Deep expertise in test architecture, testing frameworks, and QA practices in Agile / DevOps environments.
* Strong hands\\-on experience designing reusable testing frameworks (not just test automation).
* Strong coding skills in Java for framework and library development.
* Strong scripting experience in Python for utilities, tooling, and orchestration.
* Solid experience with cloud\\-native platforms ‚Äì Azure Cloud or OpenShift.
* Strong hands\\-on experience with Kubernetes (deployments, services, debugging, test execution).
* Experience integrating test frameworks with GitHub Actions and modern CI/CD pipelines.
* Hands\\-on exposure to BDD, performance/load, chaos/resilience, end\\-to\\-end, soak, sanity, and smoke testing.
* Strong understanding of cloud\\-native architectures and infrastructure services.
* Experience working with large\\-scale distributed systems or platform services.
* Proven ability to standardize testing practices across multiple engineering teams.
* Strong analytical, architectural, and problem\\-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills across engineering and leadership teams.
* Passion for building scalable testing platforms and frameworks, not just writing tests.


**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
* Design, develop, and maintain lightweight, scalable, and reusable testing frameworks for infrastructure platforms.
* Define and evolve testing architecture, strategy, and long\\-term roadmap in collaboration with engineering leadership.
* Build framework components supporting BDD, performance, chaos, resilience, E2E, conformance, soak, sanity, and smoke testing.
* Ensure testing frameworks are cloud\\- and Kubernetes\\-friendly, extensible, and easy to integrate across services.
* Assess existing testing processes, identify gaps and risks, and recommend improvements.
* Drive standardization of testing practices across multiple infrastructure and platform teams.
* Partner with engineering teams to enable adoption of platform\\-wide testing frameworks with minimal friction.
* Provide starter kits, templates, documentation, and reusable components for developer enablement.
* Collaborate closely with the existing senior test engineer to co\\-own framework evolution and execution.
* Mentor and guide engineers to elevate testing quality and maturity across teams.
* Build custom tooling, utilities, and integrations as required to support testing needs.
* Integrate testing seamlessly into CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions.
* Embed automated testing into deployment workflows and release gates.
* Work hands\\-on with Kubernetes\\-based environments for test execution and orchestration.
* Evaluate new tools, technologies, and testing approaches through POCs to validate suitability.
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex testing and pipeline issues through systematic root\\-cause analysis.
* Advocate best practices for scalability, reliability, resilience, and non\\-functional testing across the platform.


**Qualifications**
 Bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.

title: Lead Backend Engineer
description:
**This role is for one of the Weekday's clients**
**Salary range: Rs 3000000 \\- Rs 4500000 (ie INR 30\\-45 LPA)**
 Min Experience: 6 years
   

  

 JobType: full\\-time
   

  

 This role is for a Lead Software Engineer who will play a critical part in building and scaling community\\-driven platforms that enable meaningful interaction, content sharing, and collaboration at scale. You will lead the design and evolution of backend systems that power social engagement features across web and mobile, supporting a large and growing user base in a secure, reliable, multi\\-tenant environment. Working closely with product, infrastructure, and engineering teams, you will help shape the technical roadmap while ensuring high performance, data privacy, and system resilience.
   

  

**Requirements**
****Key Responsibilities****
* Architect, build, and scale backend systems that support posts, feeds, notifications, memberships, and moderation workflows
* Design and maintain fault\\-tolerant, high\\-availability services using distributed and event\\-driven architectures
* Solve complex challenges related to real\\-time updates, asynchronous processing, and multi\\-tenant access control
* Optimize system performance, scalability, and reliability across high\\-traffic workloads
* Define and evolve APIs, data models, and microservices that support secure and scalable community features
* Collaborate with product, design, and infrastructure teams to translate business needs into technical solutions
* Guide architectural decisions and contribute to long\\-term platform strategy
* Uphold best practices in code quality, automated testing, CI/CD pipelines, and development tooling
* Mentor and support engineers through code reviews, design discussions, and technical guidance
* Drive a culture of ownership, reliability, and continuous improvement across the engineering team


****What Makes You a Great Fit****
* 6\\+ years of backend or full\\-stack engineering experience building high\\-scale, production\\-grade systems
* Strong expertise in distributed systems, event\\-driven design, and asynchronous job processing
* Solid experience with both relational and NoSQL databases, including complex and time\\-based data models
* Hands\\-on experience building full\\-stack applications and working with modern frontend frameworks
* Proven ability to architect and deliver scalable, high\\-performance web platforms in multi\\-tenant environments
* Strong understanding of software design patterns, API design, and microservices architecture
* Demonstrated leadership in guiding technical decisions and mentoring engineers
* Experience implementing strong engineering practices around testing, CI/CD, and code quality
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills with the ability to communicate clearly across cross\\-functional teams

title: MERNstack Developer
description:
**Company Description**
  

 PixieBytez Innovations is a global leader in delivering innovative IT solutions, focusing on cloud automations, DevSecOps services, CI/CD pipelines, and emerging technologies. With a talented team of experts and a customer\\-centric approach, the company empowers businesses to grow using cutting\\-edge technologies. PixieBytez specializes in areas like software development, cybersecurity, contractual outsourcing, and DevOps \\& Cloud consulting, ensuring excellence in execution and customer satisfaction. The company is dedicated to creating impactful, real\\-time solutions tailored to the specific needs of its clients. Based in Ahmedabad, PixieBytez Innovations offers both full\\-time and part\\-time remote staffing services.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 PixieBytez Innovations is seeking a full\\-time, on\\-site MERN Stack Developer to join our team in Ahmedabad. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing, testing, and maintaining dynamic web applications using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack. Day\\-to\\-day responsibilities include designing user\\-friendly interfaces, optimizing web application performance, integrating APIs, ensuring code quality, and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to deliver high\\-quality solutions for clients. The developer will also perform debugging, troubleshoot technical issues, and stay updated with the latest advancements in MERN Stack development.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Proficiency in full\\-stack development with hands\\-on experience in MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js (MERN Stack)
* Strong knowledge of front\\-end development including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design
* Experience in API development, integration, and working with RESTful services
* Familiarity with modern version control systems like Git and project management tools
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills with an ability to debug and optimize code for better performance
* Strong communication skills and ability to work in a collaborative team environment
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related technical field
* Experience with Containerization using tools such as Docker/Kubernetes is a plus
* Understanding of Agile software development methodologies is beneficial

title: Power Apps Senior Software Development Engineer 2
description:
**About Sopra Steria**
 Sopra Steria, a major Tech player in Europe with 50,000 employees in nearly 30 countries, is recognised for its consulting, digital services and solutions. It helps its clients drive their digital transformation and obtain tangible and sustainable benefits. The Group provides end\\-to\\-end solutions to make large companies and organisations more competitive by combining in\\-depth knowledge of a wide range of business sectors and innovative technologies with a collaborative approach. Sopra Steria places people at the heart of everything it does and is committed to putting digital to work for its clients in order to build a positive future for all. In 2024, the Group generated revenues of ‚Ç¨5\\.8 billion.
   

  

**Job Description**
**The world is how we shape it.**
 Position: Power Apps Senior Software Development Engineer 2
   

  

 Experience 06\\-08 years
   

  

 Location: Noida
   

  

 Looking for an experienced Power Platform Engineer with proven expertise in PowerApps (Canvas Apps), Power Automate, SharePoint Online, and Dataverse. The candidate should have hands\\-on experience in Power Platform Application Lifecycle Management (ALM), including environment setup, deployment automation, and Power Platform Pipelines. The candidate will also play a key role in training and supporting citizen developers to adopt best practices in ALM.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain PowerApps (Canvas Apps) and Power Automate flows integrated with SharePoint Online and Dataverse.
* Implement Power Platform ALM best practices including solution management, environment variables, and deployment through Power Platform Pipelines.
* Manage solution exports/imports and automate deployments across Dev, Test, and Production environments.
* Support and train citizen developers in ALM, environment management, and solution governance.
* Work closely with IT admins and business teams to ensure compliance with Power Platform governance and licensing models.
* Provide technical support for existing Power Platform solutions and work on new enhancements as well as troubleshooting issues.
* Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into scalable, low\\-code solutions.
* Explore and implement automation opportunities using Copilot Studio for chatbots and AI\\-based process improvement.


**Required Skills And Experience**
* Proven experience developing PowerApps Canvas Apps and Power Automate Flows.
* Strong knowledge of SharePoint Online lists, libraries, and permissions.
* Good understanding of Dataverse schema design and relationships.
* Hands\\-on experience with Power Platform ALM, environment variables, and solution deployment via Power Platform Pipelines.
* Understanding of Power Platform Licensing Model and its impact on environment planning.
* Ability to mentor and support citizen developers on app lifecycle and governance practices.
* Basic understanding of Copilot Studio for AI Process automation.
* Strong analytical, troubleshooting, and documentation skills.


**Good To Have**
* Experience with Power BI or integration of PowerApps with Power BI.
* Knowledge of Azure DevOps integration for Power Platform deployments.


**Qualifications**
 B Tech
   

  

**Additional Information**
 Normal shift
   

  

 At our organization, we are committed to fighting against all forms of discrimination. We foster a work environment that is inclusive and respectful of all differences.
   

  

 All of our positions are open to people with disabilities.

title: Member of Technical Staff - Backend
description:
**Job Description** 




 We are looking for ambitious and authentic software developers who can bring a fresh perspective to solving challenging problems and build infrastructure that will support robust, enterprise\\-ready SaaS applications and a delightful user experience. A good grasp of operating systems, distributed systems, databases, and networking concepts and the ability to design for scale, optimized memory usage, and performance are required to be successful in thisrole. As a software developer at DevRev, you will have the opportunity to build things that ruly matter and to work with a thriving global team.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Implement features for the server\\-side architecture using relevant programming languages (e.g., C, C\\+\\+, Java, Go, Python).
* Aid in developing and maintaining robust system backbones that support microservices\\-based scalable architecture and enhance the overall user experience.
* Produce high\\-quality, testable, and efficient code in line with team standards.
* Investigate, diagnose, and resolve technical issues across various deployment environments.
* Apply foundational computer science knowledge, particularly concerning system architecture, data storage, and network communication, to assigned projects.
* Collaborate with peers on code reviews to maintain code quality and share knowledge.
* Actively participate in the team's software development lifecycle rituals (e.g., planning, daily check\\-ins, review sessions).
* Proactively seek to expand expertise in contemporary backend practices, including cloud service integration and application optimization.



  





**Minimum qualifications:** 



* Bachelor's or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or related technical field
* Software development experience coding in C, C\\+\\+, Java, Golang
* Strong experience with memory and performance optimization
* Agile development processes theoretical and practical knowledge and experience
* Creative problem solving



  





**Preferred qualifications:** 



* 3\\-4 years of experience programming with two or more of the following languages: C, C\\+\\+, Java, Golang, or Python
* Experience with implementation and development of microservices\\-based scalable architecture
* Experience with Cloud development technologies such as AWS Lambda, SQS, MongoDB, etc.
* Experience with building and operating large scale systems in multi\\-tenant environments.



  





 As part of our hiring process, shortlisted candidates will undergo a Background Verification (BGV). By applying, you consent to sharing personal information required for this process. Any offer made will be subject to successful completion of the BGV

title: Senior Application Specialist OTC
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time
   

  

 7 December 2025
   

  

**Position Title** 
 : Senior Application Specialist OTC
 **Department** 
 : IT/Digital ‚Äì OTC
   

  

**Career Path Level:** 
 Senior Reports to: Workstream Leader
   

  

**Position Purpose**
 The Senior Application specialist plays a key role in ensuring the stability, quality, and strategic evolution of IT systems and processes. With significant experience and deep domain knowledge, the Senior Application specialist takes ownership of complex technical or functional areas, mentors less experienced colleagues, and drives solution design and continuous improvement initiatives. This role serves as a bridge between operational execution and architectural thinking, providing leadership within projects and a trusted point of contact for business or technical counterparts.
   

  

**Position Summary:** 
 As a Senior Application specialist, you are a recognized expert in your IT domain. You independently manage and deliver complex initiatives, resolve critical issues, and ensure that solutions align with business needs and IT standards. Your work is both hands\\-on and strategic: balancing delivery with system improvement, business engagement, and peer development. Collaboration across functions, regions, and stakeholder groups is essential to your role.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Take proactive ownership of complex system areas, developments, or processes with minimal supervision within your area of expertise, cross functionally and together with internal and external stakeholders.
* Serve as subject matter expert in your domain; provide advanced support and solution guidance
* Design, implement, and optimize processes or system changes aligned with strategic goals and based on business objectives, user needs, and regulatory requirements.
* Mentor and support junior and mid\\-level colleagues through structured guidance and coaching.
* Actively contribute to project planning, scoping, and design activities; represent IT in business\\-facing discussions.
* Ensure adherence to industry and system standards, documentation, and compliance requirements.


**General Requirements**
* Master‚Äôs degree in System Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
* Minimum of eight years hands\\-on experience in your field of expertise.
* Proven ability to lead complex initiatives independently, such as large scale projects and drive results.
* Demonstrated leadership in process improvement, problem\\-solving, or technical advancement.
* Strong communication skills in English, both verbal and written; able to clearly convey technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Ability to collaborate effectively in cross\\-functional and international teams.
* Can support and mentor others and contribute to team development and knowledge sharing. Growth Expectations:


 Senior Application specialists are expected to demonstrate influence beyond their immediate team, consistently deliver high\\-quality outcomes, and take initiative in strategic or cross\\-team programs. Growth from Senior to Solution Architect is marked by a shift from deep expertise to broader architectural vision, proactive business engagement, and a leadership role in shaping future IT solutions.

title: Sr. Power System Simulation Study Engineer
description:
**The Opportunity**
 We are seeking a
 **Power System Application Engineer** 
 with background in electrical engineering and expertise in simulation and power quality studies to join our Engineering team. In this role, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of sustainable Grid by conducting power system studies, simulations, and calculations for power supply Grid integration projects in Renewables, Data Centre and industrial sectors. Your expertise will be instrumental in conceptualizing and optimizing solutions, ensuring the right equipment‚Äôs sizing and grid compliance. As an integral member of our global center of engineering team, you will be responsible for providing technical support, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, and contributing to the continuous growth of our organization.
   

  

**How You‚Äôll Make An Impact**
* Conducting power system studies like Load Flow, Short Circuit, and Power Quality (Power factor \\& Harmonics Analysis), Arc Flash studies using different power system modeling software's.
* Perform sizing calculations and analyze data to conceptualize effective solutions with available products, for meeting power system challenges.
* Understanding the Grid performance requirements and compliance for various Grids and grid codes. Ensure compliance with Customer‚Äôs specifications and requirements.
* Interact with customers and various internal stakeholders including sales, tendering, R\\&D, Product Specialists.
* Collaborate effectively with remote teams to enhance communication and coordination in project.
* Engineering support for tenders and projects in various segments such as Industrial, Renewables, Data Centre and Transportation sectors.
* Living Hitachi Energy‚Äôs core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.
* Responsible to ensure compliance with applicable external and internal regulations, procedures, and guidelines.
* Living Hitachi Energy‚Äôs core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.


**Your Background**
* Bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs degree in electrical engineering, specialization in Power system and power electronics; Power Quality know\\-how is preferred.
* 8 to 10 years of working experience as a Power System/Power quality Engineer, Project Technical engineer or similar position.
* Good understanding of High, Medium and Low voltage AC and DC Electrical distribution systems, AC \\& DC system modelling.
* Experience in conducting power system studies and calculations (e.g. Load flows, short circuits, Reactive power flow, harmonics analysis, Design optimization, reliability \\& availability, Opex and Capex and offering power Quality solutions)
* Strong Analytical skills and attention to details.
* Strong organizational and communication skills, proficiency in English both written and verbal, particularly with respect to explaining technical matters.


 Hitachi Energy is a global technology leader in electrification, powering a sustainable energy future through innovative power grid technologies with digital at the core. Over three billion people depend on our technologies to power their daily lives.
   

  

 With over a century in pioneering mission\\-critical technologies like high\\-voltage, transformers, automation, and power electronics, we are addressing the most urgent energy challenge of our time ‚Äì balancing soaring electricity demand, while decarbonizing the power system.
   

  

 Headquartered in Switzerland, we employ over 50,000 people in 60 countries and generate revenues of around $16 billion USD. We welcome you to apply today.

**Role Description**

 This is a remote internship opportunity for a Software Engineer Intern. The intern will assist in software development tasks such as coding, debugging, and testing, with a focus on back\\-end web development and programming. They will collaborate with the team to develop features, fix issues, and ensure high performance of the software being built.
